ygData.subject: Fwd: Lambent bits and pieces
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Melaniel I saw your post saying you thought you would have to wait on a Sol A assault.  I would be pleased to accompany you on an expedition.  I looked for
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Can anyone gimme a few hints about where and how tough the Solusek
> Mage and the Solusek Champion are. An opinion of how frequent the
> spawn and drops are would be helpful too ;-)

> Melaniel, Wood Elf Bard (27)
> Mith Marr server

Melaniel I saw your post saying you thought you would have to wait on a Sol A
assault. I would be pleased to accompany you on an expedition. I looked for you
last night but didn't see you. Give me a tell in game if you see me or send me an
email with your playing times =).

//Maravana Vireo
//49 Bard of Jus Divinum
//Mithaniel Marr
